name: Roboscape (Event Horizon School)
description:
FEATURES AND NARRATIVE CONTEXT

In order to escape from an abandoned robot facility, you will need to take control and switch between different robots, such as a security camera or a radio-controlled microcar, overcoming obstacles such as electric walls, conveyor belts, and much more!

DEVELOPED BY:

TEAM X

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1, 2020/2021)

Programming:

  • Alessandro Foddis
  • Dominic Ratti

Game Design:

  • Filippo Festa
  • Andrea De Luca

3D Art:

  • Alissia Corradini

Concept Art:

  • Lorenzo Sanarico
